name: super-potion
effect: Used on a party Pokémon : Restores 50 HP.

flavor_text.sun-moon: A spray-type medicine for treating wounds. It can be used to restore 60 HP to an injured Pokémon.
flavor_text.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: A spray-type medicine for treating wounds. It can be used to restore 60 HP to an injured Pokémon.
flavor_text.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: A spray-type medicine for treating wounds. It can be used to restore 60 HP to a single Pokémon.
